alert.note: Alert for Leavenworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Leavenworth County through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Winchester, or 7 miles northeast of Oskaloosa, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Easton, Lowemont and Jarbalo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
